name: Xelam
description:
Dive to the depths of the ocean while collecting pearl. Beware of sea monsters! shoot them to survive and collect pearls to upgrade shots.

This is my entry to Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper

Controls:

Numpad = move/swim around.

X = shoot; Press and hold X to shoot continuously and lock shooting direction; Press X while moving to a direction to shoot in that direction;

Enter = Confirm/Pause the game.

F8 = Take screenshot.
